name: Mania Blitz
description:
Mania blitz is a 4 key and 2 row rhythm game.

System requirements (low-end/low-gen computers may run the game)

CPU: Intel pentium 2nd gen

GPU: Intergrated graphics / GPU

RAM: 4GB

Resoultion: 1280x720 (locked)

OS: Windows 10 (windows 7 might be supported)

Gameplay Controls

C: Red | V: Gray | B: Blue | N: Green | ESCAPE: pauses the game

You cannot change controls as customizable controls are not available yet... 

If you see any bugs or sudden crashes while running the game, PLEASE contact ladcan via discord (LadCan#5451)
